pages-about_Description: Podcasting 2.0 certified player for Android, F-Droid, iOS, and the web. Share created clips, highlights, playlists, and chapters, sync your queue and history to all devices, and create backups with Podverse Premium. Value-for-value (V4V) funding. Not only Open Source, but also copylefted libre software. Explore the Podcast Index with popularity, profiles, and transcripts.

pages-support_Description: How to pay what Podverse is worth to you
pages-v4vWallet_Description: A browser extension that lets you send Bitcoin to content creators on any value-for-value website.
pages-verify_email_Description: Verify your e-mail address on Podverse
Password must contain: Passwords must have a number, an upper and lowercase letter, and at least 8 characters.
PleaseCheckInbox: You should receive an e-mail shortly. It may be in your spam.
PleaseVerifyEmail: Please verify your e-mail address to log in.
Podcasts, clips, and playlists are visib: Podcasts, clips, and playlists are visible on your profile page
PremiumMembershipRequired: Purchase Podverse Premium to use this
RefreshToHideNSFW: Refresh your web browser to hide NSFW content
RefreshToIncludeNSFW: Refresh your web browser to view all content
RequestAPodcastLine1: Can't find the podcast you're looking for?
RequestAPodcastLine2b: with the show name, so it can be added to the Podcast Index and our database.
RequestAPodcastLine3: Please only request publicly available RSS feeds. No private/paid/premium feeds.
Reset password email sent2: The e-mail may be in your spam folder.
Reset password successful: You can now use your new password
SearchError: Please connect to the Internet and try again.
Something went wrong: Please connect to the Internet and try again.
Success Redirecting to the home page: Success. Redirecting to the landing page…
ThankYouForVerifying: Thank you for verifying! You should now be able to log in.
ThereAreNoItemsInYourQueue: There are no items in your queue.
This feature is only available for premi: This is a Podverse Premium feature. Log in to try it for three months at no cost.
This will delete all of your Podverse da: This will delete all your Podverse data!
Time must be in hhmmss format: Time must be in hh:mm:ss format
Title: Title
TrialEnded: Please renew Podverse Premium to use all features.
Type a title for your playlist: Type a title for your playlist
Type your email to proceed: Type your Podverse Premium e-mail address
Your profile page is hidden: Your profile is hidden. Your clip and playlist links are still accessible to anyone with the links.
YourMembershipHasExpired: Please renew Podverse Premium to use all features.
